attributes.action: reject British Energy's plans to build new nuclear powerstations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no such thing as a safe level of radiation. Radioactive waste is dangerous, during transportation and storage. Nuclear powerstations will be a target for terrorists. This government is touting nuclear energy as CO2 free. It is NOT safe or 'green'. Do not buy your electricity from nuclear sources.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
